explains: n. 和弦，和音；弦；（解）腱，带
v. 以和弦演奏（或歌唱、谱曲）

sentences.en: This poem has struck a responsive chord in the hearts of its readers.
sentences.cn: 这首诗引起了读者的共鸣。

sentences.en: In himself, too, he knew that it was vibrating at last, that chord hitherto dormant and unsuspected.
sentences.cn: 在他自己心里，他也知道那根弦终于在颤动了，那根弦一直蛰伏着，不曾被察觉。

sentences.en: How many chords are involved in this chord change, and are they changing at a regular or irregular rate?
sentences.cn: 这次和弦转变一共用了多少和弦，它们的变化率是规则还是不规则的？
